mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.keyanhuojiang_name as keyanhuojiangName ,a.keyanhuojiang_types as keyanhuojiangTypes ,a.keyanhuojiang_file as keyanhuojiangFile ,a.keyanhuojiang_content as keyanhuojiangContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.keyanhuojiang_yesno_types as keyanhuojiangYesnoTypes ,a.keyanhuojiang_yesno_text as keyanhuojiangYesnoText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_uuid_number as jiaoshiUuidNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail
FROM keyanhuojiang a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and a.keyanhuojiang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.keyanhuojiangName},'%')
and a.keyanhuojiang_types = #{params.keyanhuojiangTypes}
and a.keyanhuojiang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.keyanhuojiangContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.keyanhuojiang_yesno_types = #{params.keyanhuojiangYesnoTypes}
and a.keyanhuojiang_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.keyanhuojiangYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
